titles.title: Nicholas and Zachary Burt Memorial Carbon Monoxide Poisoning Prevention Act of 2021
A bill to encourage States to require the installation of residential carbon monoxide detectors in homes, and for other purposes.
Nicholas and Zachary Burt Memorial Carbon Monoxide Poisoning Prevention Act of 2021

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

term.name: Housing for the elderly and disabled

bill.summary: Nicholas and Zachary Burt Memorial Carbon Monoxide Poisoning Prevention Act of 2021 This bill directs the Consumer Product Safety Commission to award grants to states and tribal organizations to install carbon monoxide alarms in the homes of low-income families and older adults and facilities that commonly serve children or older adults. Such carbon monoxide alarms must comply with specified standards.
